title: Where Is Natalia Grace?
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week's episode of #TheFriendZone, we usher in October's spooky season with a True Crime style episode about the strange life and times of a Ukrainian child named Natalia Grace.

The Friend Zone Live is back on the road!
Dallas - October 26th
San Francisco - December 7th
Atlanta - December 14th
Tickets on sale now - https://www.thefriendzonelive.com

Black Business of the Week - Xavier D'Leau launches eau de parfum, "D'Leau" https://waft.com/xavier.dleau

Thank you to our Sponsors:

Scam Goddess - Do you love True Crime podcasts but get worn out by all the murder and death? Then we think we have just the thing for you. Laci Mosley (aka The Scam Goddess) loves fraud, hoodwinks, hoaxes, swindles, and double-crosses which is why she created her new show, Scam Goddess! A podcast dedicated to all things fraud, coming to Earwolf Tuesday Oct 1st! You can subscribe now on Stitcher, Apple Podcasts, or where you listen!

Daily Harvest - Daily Harvest makes it easier than ever to get back into the habit of eating more fruits and vegetables, with thoughtfully sourced, chef-crafted food that can be prepared in less than 5 minutes. Fill your box with more than 65 different options — like ready-to-blend smoothies, hearty soups, and savory Harvest Bowls. Go to https://www.daily-harvest.com and enter promo code FRIENDZONE to get twenty-five dollars off your first box!

Talkspace - We all need someone to talk to — a person who can support us through rough patches or even the everyday ups and downs of life. That’s where Talkspace comes in. Talkspace is therapy for how we live today – mobile, affordable, and available when you need it. Simply provide your preferences for therapy, and Talkspace will match with one of their 5,000+ therapists the very same day. Then, you can send your therapist unlimited text, audio, picture, or video messages from anywhere, at any time. Talkspace has more than 5,000 licensed therapists who are experienced in addressing the challenges we all face. To match with your perfect therapist for a fraction of the price of traditional therapy, go to https://www.talkspace.com and use the code ZONE to get $65 off your first month and show your support for the show.

Casper Mattress - Casper is a sleep brand that makes expertly designed products to help you get your best rest, one night at a time. Casper products are cleverly designed to mimic human curves, providing supportive comfort for all kinds of bodies. The original Casper mattress combines multiple, supportive memory foams for a quality sleep surface with the right amounts of both sink and bounce. The breathable design helps you sleep cool and regulates your body temperature throughout the night. Casper offers three other mattresses: the Wave, the Essential, and the Hybrid, all designed, developed, and assembled in the US. Casper gets delivered right to your door in a small, ‘how do they do that?!’ sized box with free shipping and returns in the US and Canada.
Get $100 toward select mattresses by visiting https://casper.com/ZONE and using ZONE at checkout.

Stitch Fix - Describe your style in one word: Simple? Sophisticated? Adventurous? However you dress, the stylists at Stitch Fix can help you find your new favorite piece. Stitch Fix is an online personal styling service that delivers your favorite clothing, shoes, and accessories, directly to you. First you complete a style profile, then an expert personal stylist will send you a handpicked box of items based on your preferences. With no subscription required, you can pick between automatic shipments or only getting new pieces on demand. Get started today at https://www.stitchfix.com/FRIENDZONE and get an extra 25% off when you keep everything in your box.

Follow us online:

Twitter - https://twitter.com/FriendZonePod
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/TheFriendZonePodcast

Have a GREAT day!
